subject: feat: add platform-specific instructions for enabling blocked notifications
body:
When notification permissions are denied and cannot be re-prompted, clicking the bell button now displays detailed instructions for manually enabling notifications in system/browser settings.

Features:
- Detects denied permission status before attempting re-request
- Shows browser-specific instructions (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge)
- Shows platform-specific instructions (iOS, Android)
- Includes step-by-step guidance for each platform
- Improves UX by helping users recover from denied permissions
title: add platform-specific instructions for enabling blocked notifications
